long_description: Stop sitting on rocks and using stumps for table tops! Get the REI Camp End Table, bring a chair and start enjoying the comfortable side of camping. Tensioned nylon mesh top holds food and drinks, cleans up easily and won't puddle water if left in the rain. Table caddy stows camp essentials such as a bottle opener, cork screw and dining utensils. Steel frame provides reliable support; powder coating keeps the frame looking nice for years. Two integrated cup holders reduce spills and accommodate canned beverages and 32 oz. wide-mouth Nalgene bottles. Packs down small; includes a carry bag with adjustable shoulder strap for convenient transport and storage.
short_description: Stop sitting on rocks and using stumps for table tops! Get the REI Camp End Table, bring a chair and start enjoying the comfortable side of camping.
